name: Free Funny Pancake Maker
description:
Prepare funny, beautiful and unique pancakes. All kind of sauces, fruits, cream, candy and other specialities want to become a perfect pancake on your plate. Serve the perfect dish on the plate of your choice and make it unique with some accessories. Be creative, use your imagination! Send it to us in e-mail or share on facebook. Bon Appetit!
In the payed version available more items!
